title: Freeborn Rwere, PhD, Department of Anesthesiology, Perioperative and Pain Medicine
author: Usai; R; Majoni; S; F
sitename: Office of Faculty Development and Diversity
cleaned_text: the members of the Stanford Medicine Black Faculty Affinity Meetings (BFAM), a network created through [OFDD's Community Support Initiative](https://med.stanford.edu/facultydiversity/faculty-community/networks/OFDD-community-support-initiative.html). BFAM is intended to provide networking and social engagement opportunities for Stanford Medicine faculty across all clinical lines and departments. Freeborn Rwere, PhD Department of Anesthesiology, Perioperative and Cytochrome aldehyde dehydrogenase 2 (ALDH2) Something you wouldn't know just by looking at me. That I am Zimbabwean
